The claim was made by Jason Nassour on F: 2016, accusing Gerald Daugherty of voting to raise his salary by 19.6 percent.
Nassour calculated the percentage increa: 82,600) by the proposed salary for 2016 ($101,417), resulting in a 19.6 percent increase.
However: upon further investigation, it was found that the posted budget documents on the county's website listed the salary for 2015 as $90,109, not $82,600 as shown in Nassour's screenshot.
